name: Tophet
description: The Tophet is a Huge Construct designed as a vessel of destruction with a strong, bulky form, standing out in combat.
memorable: Its ability to grapple foes and engulf them in fire makes it a terrifying presence on the battlefield.
goals: To act as a powerful enforcer of destruction, utilizing its fiery abilities in combat.
relations: Often seen in the company of other Constructs or as guardians for evil creators.
environment: Typically found in locations where it can cause widespread damage, such as war zones or enemy fortifications.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and high hit points make it a dominant force; immunity to several conditions adds to its threat.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence limits strategic decision-making, making it predictable in combat.
attacks: Can make powerful Slam attacks that deal bludgeoning and fire damage; its Heated Body ability punishes those who come too close.
most_powerful_ability: Gout of Flame: It unleashes a devastating area attack that can severely damage multiple targets.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enabling it to see in darkness and a passive Perception of 13, allowing it to notice its surroundings effectively.
skills: Has a Perception skill of +3, allowing it to notice its surroundings fairly effectively.
additional_information: Immunity to fire, poison, and psychic damage.
Can activate its Burning Heart ability for tactical advantage.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can grapple and restrain opponents in its Burning Belly.
test_queries: monster that engulfs foes in flames
grappling creature that resists cold damage
destroyer of enemies with fiery body
